title: WTB: Toronto Baseball Maple Leafs postcards
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: WTB: Toronto Baseball Maple Leafs postcards
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
I'm interested in growing my collection of Toronto Maple Leafs pre-war baseball postcards. Team photos, RPPC's or postcards of individual players (no stadium shots). Let me know what you have!
Jeff
